page.title: 18The School Cleaner
page.content: When I married 24 years ago I left Great Horwood and came to live at 16 Winslow Road.I moved to 12 as it is a bigger house.I used to work in Winslow Hospital which I got to in my husband's car,then I worked at the Co-op shop in Swanbourne,then at the Manor House when it was an old people's home,then 13 years ago I came to this school.My hours used to be 18,now they are 10. The Co-op shop is now privately owned and it has a sub post office which used to be in the cottage next door.There used to be a bakery but it is now an antiques shop and tearoom. We used to be able to get into Winslow by bus 3 or 4 times a day and on certain days to Leighton Buzzard.Now there is a daily bus at 8a.m. to Bletchley and it returns at 6p.m.We can't go to the doctor in Winslow with- out hiring a taxi.
